name: 分隔线

jsonSchema.name: van-divider
jsonSchema.title: 分隔线
jsonSchema.description: 用于将内容分隔为多个区域

name: 单元格模块
description: 单元格为列表中的单个展示项
blocks:
[{"title":"基本用法","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-cell-group>
  <van-cell title="单元格" value="内容" is-link />
  <van-cell title="单元格" value="内容" is-link label="描述信息" />
</van-cell-group>
</template>
"},{"title":"卡片风格","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-cell-group inset>
  <van-cell title="单元格" value="内容" is-link />
  <van-cell title="单元格" value="内容" label="描述信息" is-link />
</van-cell-group>
</template>
"},{"title":"自定义右侧内容","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-cell value="内容" is-link center>
  <!-- 使用 title 插槽来自定义标题 -->
  <van-image src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/1.jpg"></van-image>
</van-cell>
</template>
"}]

<van-cell-group>

name: 栅格布局
description: 内部元素按照一定的规则布局
blocks:
[{"title":"基本用法","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-row>
  <van-row>
    <van-col span="8"></van-col>
    <van-col span="8"></van-col>
    <van-col span="8"></van-col>
  </van-row>
  <van-row>
    <van-col span="8"></van-col>
    <van-col span="8"></van-col>
    <van-col span="8"></van-col>
  </van-row>
</van-row>

</template>
"},{"title":"列元素间距","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-row>
  <van-col span="8"></van-col>
  <van-col span="8" offset="8"></van-col>
</van-row>
</template>
"}]

attrs.name: gutter
attrs.title: 列间距
attrs.description: 列元素之间的间距（单位为 px）

attrs.name: offset
attrs.title: 偏移
attrs.description: 列偏移宽度（计算方式与 span 相同）

name: 按钮

[{"title":"主要按钮","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-button type="primary" text="主要按钮"></van-button>
</template>
"},{"title":"信息按钮","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-button type="info" text="信息按钮"></van-button>
</template>
"},{"title":"默认按钮","description":"","code":"<template>

"},{"title":"警告按钮","description":"","code":"<template>

jsonSchema.name: van-button
jsonSchema.title: 按钮
jsonSchema.description: 按钮用于触发一个操作，如提交表单。

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.title: 禁用
attrs.description: 是否禁用。禁用后不会响应点击事件。

attrs.name: to
attrs.title: 路由链接
attrs.description: 需要 vue-router，与`<router-link>`的`to`属性相同。可以是一个字符串或者是描述目标位置的对象。

attrs.name: replace
attrs.title: 替换
attrs.description: 需要 vue-router，与`<router-link>`的`replace`属性相同。如果为`true`，当点击时，会调用`router.replace()`而不是`router.push()`，于是导航后不会留下`history `记录。

attrs.name: append
attrs.title: 追加路径
attrs.description: 需要 vue-router，与`<router-link>`的`append`属性相同。如果为`true`，则在当前路径后追加`to`的路径。

events.name: before-navigate
events.title: 切换路由前
events.description: 使用 router 相关属性切换路由前触发

events.name: navigate
events.title: 切换路由后
events.description: 使用 router 相关属性切换路由后触发

name: 图片展示
description: 可以用来展示一张图片，支持设置图片地址。
blocks:
[{"title":"拉伸图片，使图片填满元素","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://img01.yzcdn.cn/vant/cat.jpeg" fit="fill"></van-image>
</template>
"},{"title":"保持宽高缩放图片，使图片的长边能完全显示出来","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://img01.yzcdn.cn/vant/cat.jpeg" fit="contain"></van-image>
</template>
"},{"title":"保持宽高缩放图片，使图片的短边能完全显示出来，裁剪长边","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://img01.yzcdn.cn/vant/cat.jpeg" fit="cover"></van-image>
</template>
"},{"title":"保持图片原有尺寸","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://img01.yzcdn.cn/vant/cat.jpeg" fit="none"></van-image>
</template>
"},{"title":"取 contain、none 中较小的","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-image src="https://img01.yzcdn.cn/vant/cat.jpeg" fit="scale-down"></van-image>
</template>
"}]

jsonSchema.name: van-image
jsonSchema.title: 图片展示
jsonSchema.description: 可以用来展示一张图片，支持设置图片地址。

blocks.title: 拉伸图片，使图片填满元素
保持宽高缩放图片，使图片的长边能完全显示出来
保持宽高缩放图片，使图片的短边能完全显示出来，裁剪长边

options.title: 图片缩放比例完全填充
图片按比例尽可能大的填充

name: 幻灯片
description: 用于循环播放一组图片或内容
blocks:
[{"title":"基本用法","description":"","code":"<template>
<van-swipe class="my-swipe" :autoplay="3000" indicator-color="white" style="height:200px;">
  <van-swipe-item><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/1.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/2.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/3.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/4.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
</van-swipe>
</template>
"}]

jsonSchema.name: van-swipe
jsonSchema.title: 幻灯片
jsonSchema.description: 用于循环播放一组图片或内容

blocks.title: 基本用法
blocks.code:
<template>
<van-swipe class="my-swipe" :autoplay="3000" indicator-color="white" style="height:200px;">
  <van-swipe-item><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/1.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/2.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/3.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
  <van-swipe-item><van-image style="width:100%;height:100%" src="https://static-vusion.163yun.com/assets/cloud-ui/4.jpg"></van-image></van-swipe-item>
</van-swipe>
</template>

attrs.name: duration
attrs.title: 动画时间
attrs.description: 单位：毫秒，幻灯片切换时间，如果设置值小于动画时长，会在动画完成后切换

attrs.title: 手势滑动
attrs.description: 是否可以通过手势滑动
